subject: Crypto News. July 21, 2025
body:
View this post on the web at https://www.cryptointegrat.com/p/crypto-news-july-21-2025

Vare Crypto News is live ft Fogo Chain, Coinbase, JPMorgan, Mira Network, Solana, Ether Machine, etc
Live on YouTube:
https://youtube.com/shorts/LVqTfF4jZn8 [ https://substack.com/redirect/63169526-64e1-46b2-906e-9ee8ba515cd6?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Live on TikTok:
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMSWfMjq7/ [ https://substack.com/redirect/29862034-c1ef-45dd-bf37-f86892e58de4?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Please subscribe.
DeFi
SVM L1 Fogo launch public testnet, raised $8M in January. Dubbed the Hyperliquid of Solana as they aim to deliver 40millisec block speed etc
Coinbase launched nano Bitcoin and Ethereum perpetual futures for US traders
$410 Billion PNC Bank partnered with Coinbase to offer crypto access to customers and provide banking support to Coinbase.
According to FT, JPMorgan Chase is considering allowing customers to borrow against their crypto holdings as early as next year
Western Union CEO told Bloomberg they’re exploring ways to integrate stablecoins into its digital wallet infrastructure
Solana surpassed $100billion market cap
Pantera backed Ether Machine raised $1.5B to use 400k ETH to offer institutions direct, regulatory compliant access to ETH defi yield
Aave DAO has approved a proposal allowing the Kraken backed Ink chain, to launch a white label version of Aave V3 (use Aave v3 tech but branding and control, Ink’s)
AI Trust Layer, Mira Network to soon take Kaito snapshot with 0.5% supply allocated. Mira raised $9M in seed

Unsubscribe https://substack..e3c3dDkskJqHn1XpWlvdkWbkLqlDtCh_LkSIbaaHXcI?
